snippet: Long considered the spiritual center of Berkeley, Telegraph Avenue has become associated with panhandlers and blight.
lead_paragraph: Long considered the spiritual center of Berkeley, Telegraph Avenue has become associated with panhandlers and blight.

headline.seo: Telegraph Avenue in Berkeley Could Use a Makeover
headline.main: Berkeley’s Telegraph Avenue, Hit by Hard Times, Needs a Makeover
headline.print_headline: Berkeley’s Telegraph Avenue, Hit by Hard Times, Needs a Makeover
